mapper.select: select * from t_order where account=#{account} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_order t where 1=1 and account=#{account}

SELECT o.*,od.price,od.number productNumber,od.productName,od.productID,od.isComment,od.id orderdetailID, (select p.picture from t_product p where p.id=od.productID) picture FROM t_order o,t_orderdetail od where o.id=od.orderid and account=#{account} and o.id in #{item} order by o.id desc

SELECT o.*,od.price,od.number productNumber,od.productName,od.productID,od.isComment,od.id orderdetailID, (select p.picture from t_product p where p.id=od.productID) picture FROM t_order o,t_orderdetail od where o.id=od.orderid and account=#{account} and o.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order ( id,createdate,status,paystatus ,account ,rebate ,remark ,amount ,amountExchangeScore ,ptotal ,quantity ,fee ,expressCode ,expressName ,otherRequirement ,closedComment ,score ) values ( id,now(),#{status},#{paystatus} ,#{account} ,#{rebate} ,#{remark} ,#{amount} ,#{amountExchangeScore} ,#{ptotal} ,#{quantity} ,#{fee} ,#{expressCode} ,#{expressName} ,#{otherRequirement} ,#{closedComment} ,#{score} )
mapper.update: update t_order set id=#{id} ,status=#{status} ,refundStatus=#{refundStatus} ,paystatus=#{paystatus} ,account=#{account} ,rebate=#{rebate} ,remark=#{remark} ,amount=#{amount} ,ptotal=#{ptotal} ,quantity=#{quantity} ,expressCode=#{expressCode} ,expressName=#{expressName} ,otherRequirement=#{otherRequirement} ,lowStocks=#{lowStocks} ,closedComment=#{closedComment} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_order t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from t_order t where 1=1 and id=#{id}

SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where account=#{account} and paystatus='n' and status!='cancel') orderWaitPayCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where account=#{account} and status='cancel') orderCancelCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where account=#{account} and status in ('sign','file')) orderCompleteCount FROM t_systemsetting
mapper.delete: delete from t_order where 1=1 and id=#{id}
